statements: SELECT * FROM VehicleMileage
SELECT vehicle_id, mileage FROM VehicleMileage
SELECT * FROM VehicleMileage WHERE last_maintenance_date <= '2022-09-30'
SELECT * FROM VehicleMileage ORDER BY next_maintenance_date ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, mileage, next_maintenance_date FROM VehicleMileage WHERE mileage > 50000
SELECT vehicle_id, mileage, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM VehicleMileage WHERE vehicle_id = 1
SELECT * FROM VehicleMileage ORDER BY mileage DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, mileage FROM VehicleMileage WHERE mileage > 5000 ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC
SELECT * FROM VehicleMileage WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT MIN(mileage), MAX(mileage), AVG(mileage) FROM VehicleMileage
SELECT * FROM vehicle_mileage;
SELECT vehicle_id, mileage FROM vehicle_mileage WHERE mileage > 5000;
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_mileage ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT vehicle_id, scheduled_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_mileage WHERE vehicle_id = 'c7bd6c4e-6d15-4f27-ae4d-e5c68516c6f2';
SELECT mileage, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_mileage WHERE mileage > 5000 ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_date < '2022-02-28';

SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(mileage) AS num_maintenance FROM vehicle_mileage JOIN maintenance_schedule ON vehicle_mileage.vehicle_id = maintenance_schedule.vehicle_id GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING num_maintenance > 2;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_mileage WHERE last_maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_mileage
SELECT vehicle_id, mileage FROM vehicle_mileage WHERE mileage > 50000
SELECT vehicle_id, MAX(mileage) AS max_mileage FROM vehicle_mileage GROUP BY vehicle_id
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change'
SELECT * FROM replacement_parts ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicle_mileage WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'oil change' ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM replacement_parts WHERE quantity > 5 AND vehicle_id = 2;
SELECT vehicle_id, mileage FROM vehicle_mileage WHERE mileage BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY maintenance_type ASC, schedule_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM Vehicle ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vehicles FROM Vehicle;
SELECT AVG(mileage) AS average_mileage FROM Vehicle;
SELECT * FROM Maintenance WHERE maintenance_type='Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, model FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM Maintenance LEFT JOIN Vehicle ON Maintenance.vehicle_id = Vehicle.vehicle_id;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year, COUNT(*) as maintenance_count FROM Vehicle JOIN Maintenance ON Vehicle.vehicle_id = Maintenance.vehicle_id GROUP BY manufacturer, model, year;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_type, service_date FROM ServiceHistory WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT vehicle_name, model_year FROM Vehicle WHERE model_year > 2010;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE cost > 500;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceHistory ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT part_name, part_type, part_cost FROM ReplacementParts WHERE part_type = 'Engine';
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT vehicle_name, model_year, mileage FROM Vehicle WHERE model_year > 2015;
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_date, cost FROM MaintenanceHistory ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT part_name, part_type, part_cost FROM ReplacementParts WHERE part_cost > 100 ORDER BY part_cost ASC;
SELECT vehicle_name, log_date, miles_driven FROM Vehicle JOIN MileageLog ON Vehicle.vehicle_id = MileageLog.vehicle_id WHERE miles_driven > 500 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
